method.comment: /** * @param string $sLoginMode: SSO login mode * @param string $sEmail: login/email of user being currently provisioned * @param \Hybridauth\User\Profile $oUserProfile : hybridauth GetUserInfo object response * * @return array: array includes the 2 provisioned objects [Person, UserExternal] * @throws \Combodo\iTop\HybridAuth\HybridProvisioningAuthException */
